thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1890
thread.title: Sarah

author: Sarah
title: Sarah
text:
I am so happy to have found FlightHub in my online research by far the best and cheapest flight prices for flying to Thailand.
The only thing I wish I knew about what a hidden service charge. I bought the flight package from Toronto to Bangkok and back however had to add a flight from Sudbury to Toronto and back home of course. I was able to add all the flights in the same check out cart so I was hit with the service charge 3 times. It's only $11.99 but it would have been nice to know about it.
